sentences.sContent: Day in and day out, the flat crack of the tank guns reverberates through the little Bavarian town.
sentences.sCn: 日复一日地，单调的坦克炮的轰隆声在巴伐利亚的这个小镇上空回响着。

synos.tran: 回响；反响；弹回；不断发生后效

remMethod.val: re + verber(打， 振动) + ate → 振动回来 → 发出回声

words.tran: 回响的；反射的；起回声的

trans.tranOther: if a loud sound reverberates, it is heard many times as it is sent back from different surfaces
